Product Name: Women's Sweater Pullover Sweater Jumper Turtleneck Knit Knitted Raglan Sleeves Spring Fall Home Daily Holiday Daily Casual Soft Long Sleeve Pure Color White Light Green
Highlights: ['[Fabric] Crafted from a premium polyester knit, this sweater offers a soft and stretchy feel that ensures both warmth and comfort throughout the day. The high-quality material makes it a durable and stylish piece for any wardrobe. [Fit and Style] Featuring a regular fit, this pullover sweater is designed for versatile wear. Its turtleneck style adds a touch of elegance, ideal for both casual and slightly more dressy outfits. The relaxed fit allows for easy pairing with various wardrobe staples. [Design Highlights] The sweater is adorned with ribbed detailing on the cuffs, hem, and neck, which introduces a subtle texture and enhances its overall style appeal. The long raglan sleeves ensure a full range of motion, while adding a modern twist to the classic design. [Occasions] Perfect for daily wear, whether at home or while out for casual gatherings. Its chic design and cozy warmth make it an excellent choice for holidays or colder seasons like fall and winter. Pair it effortlessly with jeans, skirts, or layer it over a dress for diverse styling options. [Size Range] Available in a range of sizes from S to XL, this sweater caters to various body types, offering a comfortable and flattering fit. Choose your usual size for a regular fit experience. [Color Options] This sweater is available in a variety of colors including vibrant orange, white, red, pink, beige, camel, purple, light green, and dark green, allowing you to find the perfect hue to complement your personal style.']
